entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening then clear. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
